column1:
For this study, we are only interested in participants that are currently college students. Unless you answered the last question incorrectly by accident, you should not proceed with this study.

Please send an email to mrh133@pitt.edu with the subject line: "Not a College Student" to be removed from this study without penalty.

After sending that email, you may close this window/tab in your browser.

If you responded to the previous question incorrectly by mistake, you may close this window and re-open the link to restart this task.
